00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 # -*- coding: latin-1 -*-
00003 """
00004 Starts Life Fighter.
00005 """
00006 
00007 #Import Modules
00008 import pygame
00009 from pygame.locals import *
00010 del pygame.movieext
00011 
00012 from settings import *
00013 from utils import *
00014 from life import Grid
00015 from stages import *
00016 from menu import Menu
00017 
00018 import sys
00019 
00020 if not pygame.font: print 'Warning, fonts disabled'
00021 if not pygame.mixer: print 'Warning, sound disabled'
00022 
00023 def main():
00024     #Initialize 
00025     pygame.init()
00026     screen = pygame.display.set_mode((width, height))
00027     pygame.display.set_caption(WINDOW_TITLE)
00028     icon = load_image(ICON)
00029     pygame.display.set_icon(icon)
00030 
00031     background = load_image(BGIMAGE1)
00032     screen.blit(background, (0, 0))
00033 
00034     #Create a grid and a game clock
00035     grid = Grid(n1, n2, x_off, y_off, step, line)
00036     clock = pygame.time.Clock()
00037 
00038     #Create main menu
00039     font1 = pygame.font.Font(FONT1, 40)
00040     font2 = pygame.font.Font(FONT1, 35)
00041     sound1 = load_sound(TYPEW1)
00042     sound2 = load_sound(TYPEW2)
00043     options = ["Jugar", "Salon de la fama", "Vida", "Editor", \
00044                "Configuracion", "Ayuda", "Salir"]
00045     menu = Menu(screen, background, font1, font2, color1, color2, sound1, sound2, options)
00046 
00047     #Create play menu
00048     font1 = pygame.font.Font(FONT1, 50)
00049     font2 = pygame.font.Font(FONT1, 45)
00050     options = ["Entrenamiento", "Cuenta pasos", "Contra Reloj", "Combinado", "Volver"]
00051     play = Menu(screen, background, font1, font2, color1, color2, sound1, sound2, options)
00052 
00053     #Create help menu
00054     options = ["El juego", "Reglas de evolucion", "Controles", "Creditos", "Volver"]
00055     help = Menu(screen, background, font1, font2, color1, color2, sound1, sound2, options)
00056 
00057     while True:
00058         
00059         op = menu.main_loop()
00060 
00061         if op == 0:
00062             op = play.main_loop()
00063             if op == 0:
00064                 Train(clock, screen, background, grid).main_loop()
00065             elif op == 1:
00066                 Moves(clock, screen, background, grid).main_loop()
00067             elif op == 2:
00068                 Clock(clock, screen, background, grid).main_loop()
00069         elif op == 2:
00070             Life(clock, screen, background, grid).main_loop()
00071         elif op == 3:
00072             Editor(clock, screen, background, grid).main_loop()
00073         elif op == 5:
00074             op = help.main_loop()
00075         elif op == 6:
00076             sys.exit(0)
00077 
00078     #Create a game
00079     #game = Editor(clock, screen, background, grid)
00080     #game = Train(clock, screen, background, grid)
00081     #game = Moves(clock, screen, background, grid)
00082     #game = Clock(clock, screen, background, grid)
00083     #game.main_loop()
00084     
00085 if __name__ == '__main__':
00086     main()
